author: thenateway
content: Thinking generally on the different security models of rpc reads vs rpc writes, I wonder if it would be easier to allow users to solve the problem of safe transaction propagation on their own, and optionally separate the rpc url flags on clients into two separate options, one for writes and one for reads, since you usually want different things out of them.

author: thenateway
content: one points at your local node, the other points at something like hopr or flashbots

author: thenateway
content: actually this would be more of a wallet thing I suppose
